ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Instead of hard resists, just put in lower resists. Like, the Shock of Lightning performs ok for mobs up to level 22, then two third damage up to level 24,
ygData.messageBody:
According to Wizard:
> If it is true that also with enchanters help we cannot hit 6 + i agree to
> petition on this. I hate to read in a necro list that they kill SAND GIANTS

Instead of hard resists, just put in lower resists. Like, the Shock of Lightning
performs ok for mobs up to level 22, then two third damage up to level 24, half
at level 26, and a fourth to level 30, and full resist after that.

Note that Verant apparently considers the sand giant slaying bordering on
the bug abuse. So I don't expect us to be helped, but the others fixed :)

--
